function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High frequency of public transport usage","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to close proximity and shared spaces","Mitigation":"Promote social distancing measures, increase ventilation, and enhance cleaning protocols","Technologies":"Ventilation technology, contactless payment systems, and occupancy monitoring","People":"Passengers, public transport operators, and city residents","Owner":"Public transport operators, local government"},{"Description":"Use of multiple means of transport","Impact":"Potential for exposure to different environments and surfaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Encourage hygiene practices, provide hand sanitizers, and implement regular cleaning of transport vehicles","Technologies":"Transport vehicle cleaning systems, hand sanitizer dispensers, and touchless door openers","People":"Passengers, public transport operators, and city residents","Owner":"Public transport operators, local government"},{"Description":"Low percentage of public transport users for environmental reasons","Impact":"Reduced motivation for behavioral changes for disease prevention, such as wearing masks or using hand sanitizers","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns on the connection between environmental and public health, incentivize eco-friendly travel habits","Technologies":"Digital signage for health messaging, sustainability tracking apps, and educational video content","People":"Passengers, environmental organizations, and public health institutions","Owner":"Local government, public health institutions"}]}
